meta_description: The Museum of the City of New York celebrates and interprets the city, educating the public about its distinctive character, especially its heritage of diversity, opportunity, and perpetual transformation.
hours_text:
#  Visit Us

  * 

[1220 Fifth Ave at 103rd St., HOURS: Mon-Fri 10-5 | Sat-Sun 10-6 ](https://goo.gl/maps/Hn6QavCxhmM2)

  * [__Visit MCNY on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/museumofcityny/)
  * [__Visit MCNY on TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@museumofcityny)
  * [__Visit MCNY on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MuseumofCityNY)
  * [__Visit MCNY on Threads](https://www.threads.net/@museumofcityny)
  * [__Visit MCNY on Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/MuseumofCityofNY)
  * [__Sign up for our mailing list](https://mcny.us8.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=cb22a8633af4f71cdfbae4def&id=4336ff1f8c)

[ Purchase Tickets ](https://35948.blackbaudhosting.com/35948/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=e8515371-445d-47a5-9f63-15dcb8fa977e) [ Donate Now ](https://35948.blackbaudhosting.com/35948/Annual-Fund)

# **Hours**

**Open:****Mon-Fri 10-5 | Sat-Sun 10-6**  
 _Closed Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Year's Day_

* * *

#   
**Admission (includes all exhibitions)**

New York City Residents* – Pay what you can  
Wednesdays – Free for everyone**

Ticket Type| Cost  
---|---  
Adults| $23  
Seniors (65+)*| $18 with I.D.  
Students (19+)*| $14 with I.D.  
Ages 18 and under| Free*  
Members| Free  
  
 _* With ID, does not apply to groups (10+ people)_  
_** Does not apply to groups (10+ people). Free Wednesday tickets only available at ticket counters._

Groups of 10 or more must make a reservation in advance.

[Purchase Tickets](https://35948.blackbaudhosting.com/35948/tickets?tab=3&tx...

## Discover MCNY

[Visit Us](/visit)

  * 

[1220 Fifth Ave at 103rd St., HOURS: Mon-Fri 10-5 | Sat-Sun 10-6 ](https://goo.gl/maps/Hn6QavCxhmM2)

  * [__Visit MCNY on Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/museumofcityny/)
  * [__Visit MCNY on TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@museumofcityny)
  * [__Visit MCNY on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MuseumofCityNY)
  * [__Visit MCNY on Threads](https://www.threads.net/@museumofcityny)
  * [__Visit MCNY on Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/MuseumofCityofNY)

[ Purchase Tickets ](https://35948.blackbaudhosting.com/35948/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=e8515371-445d-47a5-9f63-15dcb8fa977e) [ Donate Now ](https://35948.blackbaudhosting.com/35948/Annual-Fund)

## [What's On](https://www.mcny.org/whats-on)

From critically acclaimed exhibitions to new programs, explore MCNY this season. 

Exhibitions 

## [Robert Rauschenberg’s New York](https://www.mcny.org/exhibition/robert-rauschenbergs-new-york)

Features rarely seen photos that reveal Rauschenberg's deep engagement with the real world and his complex relationship with New York City.

Exhibitions 

## [Gingerbread NYC](https://www.mcny.org/exhibition/gingerbread-nyc)

Discover a miniature frosted cityscape as professional and amateur bakers from across the five boroughs design edible creations that celebrate New York City.
